Summary: Mothership sited through window of bus
divs: Sighting DetailsThe fact that I saw a mothership UFO in recently in Colorado is of no particular importance. I am taking this method of contact due to the fact that I am very disappointed to find that Stan Friedman's phone has no more space for leaving messages, and I am not confident that I actually have his e-mail address. I am watching the hearing on disclosure on streamer, and a question arose just now, regarding "If there is anyone still alive who actually saw a body at the Roswell incident. I am well acquainted with a woman who was at the site because her son was stationed there with the air force. I have known her for many years, and have no reason to believe she is lying or that she imagined this. If Mr. Friedman could contact me, I will be glad to share what I know about this person and what she shared with me. I do not want to provide details at this time as not of consequence.
